description:
Montreal, Oct. 20, 2014 - Rory Geoghegan presents yje "Pyed Piper" aka pyp, a Linux command line text manipulation tool similar to awk or sed, but which uses standard Python string and list methods as well as custom functions evolved to generate fast results in an intense production environment.

Useful links:
* Rory: https://twitter.com/r_geoghegan
* pyp: http://sflx.ca/pyp
* MP40: http://sflx.ca/mp49e
* Montreal Python: http://montrealpython.org
* Savoir-faire Linux: http://sflx.ca/jobs
title: Module of the month: pyp #MP49
